name: Broken Switch
description:
(This game was made at TEDI gamejam #29 and the theme is EVERY 10 SECONDS)

You are lost in an abandoned hospital during the night, watch out as there are monsters nearby and the alarm of your phone which can give away your location, is set to every 10 seconds (as theme suggests), and worst of all ... your switch is broken ... and you have to press randomly picked key of your keyboard to stop it

HAVE FUN!
